Name: Golden Girl
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grated orange zest.
Review: This appropriately named velvety drink is a refined dessert in a glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dale DeGroff in New York City, USA. I've slightly increased the proportions of rum and port from Dale's original recipe.
